page.title: 11Alton Population Survey
page.content:
30 11 year old children surveyed.
Born in Alton.....................53% Moved to Alton a) from another part of Hampshire.20% b) from outside Hampshire.........27%
Lived in same house since birth...23% Moved once........................37% Moved twice.......................20% Moved three times.................13% Moved more than 3 times............7% Did parents move to Alton because of job?.13%
Daily Movement Father works within Alton.........33% Father works outside Alton........57% Mother works in Alton.............60% Mother works out of Alton.........10%
